name: Gentle Foaming Face Wash
description: Mild foaming cleanser for daily use – suits all skin types.
detailed_desc: Formulated for sensitive skin, this gentle foaming face wash effectively removes dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. Soap-free, fragrance-free, and pH balanced for everyday use.

name: Oil-Free Micellar Water
description: Micellar water that removes makeup, dirt, and excess oil without rinsing.
detailed_desc: Garnier's Micellar Cleansing Water is a multipurpose product that removes makeup, cleanses, and refreshes skin. Ideal for sensitive and oily skin types, it's gentle and alcohol-free.

name: Hydrating Rose Toner
description: Alcohol-free toner that hydrates and tightens pores.
detailed_desc: Enriched with rose water and hyaluronic acid, this toner soothes, refreshes, and restores pH balance while minimizing the appearance of pores.

name: Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer
description: Lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer for oily & combination skin.
detailed_desc: This water-based gel moisturizer is packed with hyaluronic acid for intense hydration without clogging pores. It's ideal for hot climates and oily skin.

name: Daily SPF 50+ Sunscreen
description: Broad-spectrum sunscreen with no white cast.
detailed_desc: Minimalist’s SPF 50 sunscreen offers PA+++ protection from UVA/UVB rays with lightweight, fast-absorbing texture. It blends seamlessly, leaving no greasy residue or white cast.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: Potent Vitamin C serum for radiant, even-toned skin.
detailed_desc: Packed with 10% Vitamin C and antioxidants, this serum targets dullness, dark spots, and uneven skin tone to reveal visibly brighter and healthier skin.

name: AHA+BHA Peeling Solution
description: Chemical exfoliator that unclogs pores and refines skin texture.
detailed_desc: This exfoliating solution with 10% AHA and 2% BHA helps remove dead skin cells, clear pores, and improve skin texture. Ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.

name: Hydrating Sheet Mask (Pack of 5)
description: Nourishing sheet masks for instant glow and hydration.
detailed_desc: These Korean sheet masks provide deep hydration and glow with ingredients like green tea, aloe, and hyaluronic acid. Use weekly for refreshed, glowing skin.

name: Retinol 0.3% Night Serum
description: Anti-aging serum with retinol to reduce fine lines & acne.
detailed_desc: This gentle retinol serum improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, and controls acne. Enriched with peptides and antioxidants, it's perfect for night care routines.

name: Under Eye Cream with Caffeine
description: Revitalizing eye cream that reduces puffiness and dark circles.
detailed_desc: Infused with caffeine and hyaluronic acid, this eye cream helps depuff tired eyes and brighten dark circles while keeping the under-eye area hydrated.

name: Lip Sleeping Mask Berry
description: Overnight lip mask that nourishes and softens lips.
detailed_desc: This cult-favorite sleeping lip mask contains berry extracts and vitamin C to intensely hydrate and repair dry, chapped lips overnight.
key_feat: ✅ A Little Goes a Long Way

name: Acne Spot Patch
description: Invisible hydrocolloid patches that flatten pimples overnight.
detailed_desc: These thin acne patches absorb pus and protect breakouts from bacteria. Stick them on overnight and wake up with visibly reduced pimples.

name: Aloe Vera Soothing Gel
description: 100% pure aloe gel for soothing, cooling, and hydrating skin.
detailed_desc: A multi-purpose aloe gel that calms irritation, heals minor cuts, hydrates skin, and even works as a post-sun treatment.
key_feat: ✅ Can Be Used on Face, Hair, & Body

name: Charcoal Clay Mask
description: Detoxifying clay mask that deeply cleanses and purifies skin.
detailed_desc: Formulated with charcoal, kaolin clay, and coffee, this mask pulls out dirt and impurities, controls oil, and improves skin clarity after just one use.
key_feat: ✅ Suitable for Normal to Oily Skin

name: Niacinamide 10% Serum
description: Serum that regulates oil and reduces acne marks.
detailed_desc: A potent serum with 10% niacinamide and 1% zinc that targets acne marks, regulates sebum production, and brightens skin tone.

name: Cica Calming Cream
description: Soothing cream for irritated and sensitive skin.
detailed_desc: Infused with Centella Asiatica, this calming cream helps reduce redness, inflammation, and boosts skin repair. Ideal for reactive and sensitive skin.

name: Tea Tree Face Wash
description: Cleansing face wash with antibacterial tea tree oil.
detailed_desc: Enriched with purifying tea tree oil, this face wash deeply cleanses skin, reduces acne, and leaves skin feeling refreshed without over-drying.

name: Rice Water Bright Cleansing Foam
description: Brightening face cleanser made with rice water extract.
detailed_desc: This creamy foam cleanser removes impurities while brightening skin tone using natural rice water extracts. Leaves skin soft, supple, and glowing.

name: Hydrating Night Cream
description: Intense night cream for deep hydration and repair.
detailed_desc: Olay's night cream is designed to hydrate and replenish the skin overnight. It reduces fine lines and helps repair skin barrier with peptides and glycerin.

name: Vitamin C Glow Boosting Moisturizer
description: Daily moisturizer enriched with Vitamin C for radiant skin.
detailed_desc: Infused with Amazonian camu camu berries, this glow-boosting moisturizer helps improve skin tone, energize dull complexions, and provide hydration throughout the day.
